channel.title: Attacking on NPCs?
channel.description:
Hello there guys, i added a boss wich drops good loot, there is just one problem. I want to make this spot a place where players can attack the NPC with more the 1 player, because it says: "The npc is already under attack."
Thx for helping :)

item.title: Attacking on NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

definately, just add the exact zone you want to be multi-combat to this method in client.java:

public boolean multiCombat() {

The format is:

(absX >= LLLL && absX <= HHHH && absY >= LLLL && absY <=HHHH)

LLLL are your lowest x and y values. To obtain these run to the south-west corner of where you want multi-combat to finish and do ::mypos

HHHH are your highest x and y values. To obtain these run to the north-east corner of where you want multi-combat to finish and do ::mypos

Hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Attacking on NPCs?
item.dc:creator: @Xaryza Xaryza
item.description:
@Xaryza wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:2, topic:376513”]You need to make the area multicombat (obviously)

how to do this depends on what server base you are using, so please give more details[/quote]
Im using a Delta based source, so it should be no problem. And one more thing.
The place where i spawned the NPC is already in a PK-zone and its 1 on 1 there, so would it be possible to create a multi-zone there?

Read full topic
